title: Back coming off on an imported Pixel 4XL, what are my options?
content: Hello, I am facing a problem with a swelling battery on my Pixel 4XL. I live in Czech Republic and I imported the phone from Canada. Is there anything I can do? Will google take an imported phone for a warranty repair when it's not on the country of it's purchase?
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
